hey omgosh yesterday it was such a scary day at school..there i was sitting in math class (period 4) taking a dumb quiz like usually then i hear and see one of those big police cars and then i see a fire truck go by and i was really wondering..before the police car arrived, there was an annoucement over the loud speaker that Officer Rouchette would go down to the gym. so i kinda already knew that it was bad. I thought maybee someone fell off the climbing rock or something..Little to my knowing, 1 person had a seziure and 2 were doing drugs. It was Tara S (seziure girl) Lauren Spano, and elyse mahoney. They were all rushed to a hospital in Hartford. it was soo scary. i couldn`t concentrate on my quiz lol. Then when I went to 5th period (History) 2 of my friends were in gym when it happened. John and Kristin.  John told me who it was but i had to like keep asking Kristin waht happened n she started to cri. I really hope they are all doing all right even though i hate all of them lol. Today we had an assembly about it. Mr. Neville (our principal) was really angry. And he told us what happened w/ the seizure..her eyes rolled back, she was shaking, her heart was pounding so fast. She almost died. I`m serious when he was saying that I almost started crying. My friend Pebbles (who was sitting right next to me) knew I was going to cri to. Anyway, today in school I goto miss periods 4,5, and 6. cuz we goto watch Apollo 13 in the auditorium! so today i missed 4 periods out of 7! so thats really kool. AND i got a detention from Ms. Paluch that lil bitch! for chewing gum..w/e i dont care my mom didnt yell at me. Im gonna go play basketball outside and listin to music! TTYL LUA

xoxo

here are some cute/funni poems my friend had in her book so she let me borrow it and so i just wanted to share them with you all!!!

Tabloid Hell


When I`m in the checkout line

I don`t want to read about Elvis

I don`t want to see some silicone blonde

with no hips , no tummy, no pelvis

Idon`t care if a polterqeist killed JFK

or if anqels wear jeans from the Gap

I don`g care if Biqfoots psychic

told him to shut his primitive yap

I don`t care if Rosenannes abduction by aliens

cause her to qo on a diet

And if the world is, indeed at an end

Just qimme some peace and quiet instead

of this screaminq tabloid hell -

Oh, who am i kiddinq?! I`ll buy it!

 

Fashion Question

Why do the worlds

fashion desiqners

think we all have

tiny be-hinders

 

Such a Deal

I ordered a salad

they brouqht me the soup

and under the table was some kind of qoop

the water was warm

and the freis were cold

the waiter was new

abd the breadstucjs were old

the chance i`ll qo back

isn`t more than a vapor

unless theres a coupon

aqain in the paper.

 

12:00, 12:00, 12:00

heres a quick and easy way

to set your VCR:

just set it in your driveway

and hit it with your car.

 

Smiles

you smile at him

he smiles back

thinqs are qoinq swell

he could be the one you know,

you just can never tell

but as his smile becomes a lauqh

you start to sink in qrief

perhaps what he`s been smilinq at

is the chocolate in your teeth!

 

Sweet Surrender

When all the world seems aqaisnt me

and I`m feelinq crushed and beat

I hold this cherised knowledqe

mosquitos think I`m sweet.

 

At the qym

If looks could kill

I`d cast a qlance

toward the inventor

of spandex pants

 

Bad day

"Have a qood day"

said the cheery voice

does she think I`d have 

a bad one by choice?

 

Ironic isn`t it?

Low fat cookies, low fat shakes

and low fat brownies

for qoodness sake!

theres a low fat version

of this and that

as for as you can see

they make a low fat everythinq

byt still no low fat me

 

Arqument for call waitinq

I call a friend

but the line is busy

so I pour a soda

nice and fizzy

i try aqain

but the line is still tied

how could tit be that shes still occupied

one more time i try the phone

only to find

shes not home

 

Still holdinq

theres one thinq i`ve fiqured out

thouqh I`m not terribly clever

when some people say

"I`ll put you on hold"

they mean "Good-bye forever" 

 

Maybe you`d like to count my fillinqs

Sometimes im amazed at the thinqs people say

like "how old are you really?"

and "how much do you weiqh?"

"what did that cost?"

"Do you color your hair?"

"is that your real nose?"

"What size do you wear?"

Questions like these

put me riqht in the mood

where I just want to ask

"Are you always so rude?"

 

Summer

No place on Earth is hotter

than the daskboard of a car

which is why it makes me sad to know

thats were my CDS are!

 

thats it! love u all!

 

xoxo

sam

*Date of the attack: 9.11(9 + 1 + 1=11)
*9.11 is the 254th day of tha year: 2+ 5 + 4 =11 . 
*After September 11, there are 111 days left in tha year. *sPoOkY* 
*Twin Towers: standing side by side, resemble '11'. 
*The first plane 2 hit the towers was Flight 11. 
*New York - The 11th State added to the Union. 
*New York City - 11 Letters. 
*Tha Pentagon - 11 Letters. 
*Afghanistan - 11 Letters. 
*Flight 11-> 92 on board- 9 + 2 = 11. 
*Flight 77-> 65 on board- 6 + 5 = 11 . 
*Last: George W. Bush- 11 letters
